Articles.Content:
Floor 301 (20 from the center of Milky Way): A sign:

Ha ha, my friend, the gauge has tricked you! You are 50 floors from the center of Milky Way!
Floor 302: The edge of the universe Simulation
Floor 303: Dark Matter research labs
Floor 304: Pool of rocket fuel
Floor 305: The Red Army Choir performing "ÃÂ­ÃÂ¹, Ã‘Æ’Ã‘â€¦ÃÂ½ÃÂµÃÂ¼"

Floor 306: Me.

Oh, and there's David Tennant too.
Floor 307: Tetris!
Floor 308 (2 from the center of Milky Way): Damn it Quantum Teleporter!

Floor 308: Just as you finished cursing at the Quantum Teleporter, it Teleported This floor, and all floors above you all the way to the bottom, right next to floor 1, where you see the shops that are all still there.

Floor 308: Just as you finished cursing at the Quantum Teleporter, it Teleported This floor, and all floors above you all the way to the bottom, right next to floor 1, where you see the shops that are all still there.

You can't go back down, even if the floor number increases.

Floor 309: A sign:

Ignore what happened in the last floor, wallpapers are tricking you. You are actually here to look at the black holes. You'll be out of the center shortly.
Floor 310: A Milkshake and a way
Floor 311: Imgur in all of its strange, funny, giraffe-like glory.
Floor 312: The quantum teleporter teleports this floor and all floors above you to the edge of the Andromeda galaxy, good luck making it to the center!
Floor 313: Advanced soap development facilities.

Floor 314: A huge, anechoic chamber. Too bad the elevator can only take you from here and you can't go back to the lower floor anymore, then the elevator that will bring you to the next floor is still 10 kilometers away.
Floor 315 Anderson cooper twerking
Floor 316: Nothing. Just a blank... space? You're honestly not quite sure what this is. Moving on!

Floor 317:

This

saying "Take it easy!" over and over.
Floor 318: Z space.
Floor 319 (75 from center of Andromeda Galaxy): The quantum teleporter teleports you to 75 floors from the center of the Andromeda Galaxy.
Floor 320: The place where all my hair ties end up when they vanish.
Floor 321: The spacescraper is being pushed by a white hole.

A room that is bigger on the inside than outside. It has a teleportation machine to all other floors, and there are hundreds of apartment rooms, with Travelators to get everywhere faster. There is also a desk where you can get a room.

You get a room and stay a few nights, using the teleportation machine to go to the restaurants across the tower and back.

After the rest you continue your journey to the top.

Floor 322: A sign:

Technically you should still be inside Earth's atmosphere (if each floor is 10 feet tall, the height of the building at this floor is only 3220 feet, a little more than half a mile), but through the magic of... magic we can put you anywhere!

Well, that's interesting... Next!
Floor 323: A tip reminding you of the Saturn-V rocket and the AT-ST that was in the earlier floors
